entry.title: 吴说获悉，POAP 社区正在就 4 月 17 日引入的商业使用政策进行探讨。当新模块推出后，Proof of Attendance Protocol（出席证明协议）将保持个人使用免费，所有相...
entry.summary: 吴说获悉，POAP 社区正在就 4 月 17 日引入的商业使用政策进行探讨。当新模块推出后，Proof of Attendance Protocol（出席证明协议）将保持个人使用免费，所有相关成本由 POAP 公司资助，执行大规模商业空投的发行人将被要求付费使用。

entry.title: Re 吴说获悉，慢雾创始人余弦表示，OpenSea Pro 提示用户启用的 eth_sign 风险性较高。原因是 eth_sign 的盲签内容对于用户来说是完全无法识别其中风险的，钓鱼...
entry.summary:
Re 吴说获悉，慢雾创始人余弦表示，OpenSea Pro 提示用户启用的 eth_sign 风险性较高。原因是 eth_sign 的盲签内容对于用户来说是完全无法识别其中风险的，钓鱼们(drainers)可以通过这个钓走用户的任意资产，其中包括 ETH 这样的原生资产。 https://twitter.com/evilcos/status/1643410971409670145
Cos(余弦)😶‍🌫️: 喊了那么久，钱包们也努力去屏蔽或默认禁用了 eth_sign 这种原生盲签函数，就是因为 eth_sign 的盲签内容对于用户来说是完全无法识别其中风险的，eth_sign 很强大也很危险，钓鱼们(drainers)可以通过这个钓走你的任意资产，其中包括 ETH 这样的原生资产。 然后，OpenSea Pro 让历史车轮倒退了…🥲

entry.title: Labor market still tight. Not sure the bond market has this one right.
entry.summary:
Labor market still tight. Not sure the bond market has this one right.
Guy Berger: 3/ Hiring is still a little elevated relative to what we'd expect given the unemployment rate, but much less than a year ago. Hires rate is consistent with an unemployment rate ~2.8%. A year ago, I would have said "consistent with an unemployment rate less than 1%"! https://t.co/1A7VGXvFGS

entry.summary:
吴说获悉，MetaMask 宣布在最新版本的扩展中，只要启用自动 NFT 检测，所有 ERC-721 和 1155 代币都会出现。通过此更新，您可以发送 ERC-721 代币，将很快添加发送 ERC-1155 代币的功能。https://twitter.com/MetaMask/status/1643283434771456000
MetaMask 🦊💙: In our latest version of extension, all ERC-721 and 1155 tokens should appear as long as automatic NFT detection is enabled. With this update, you can send ERC-721 tokens. We’ll add the ability to send ERC-1155 tokens soon.

entry.title: If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral. Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on ...
entry.summary:
If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral. Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on bet. Because of tweet, people buy Bitcoin moving price up 1%. He pockets $2m. https://twitter.com/balajis/status/1636797265317867520
Balaji: I will take that bet. You buy 1 BTC. I will send $1M USD. This is ~40:1 odds as 1 BTC is worth ~$26k. The term is 90 days. All we need is a mutually agreed custodian who will still be there to settle this in the event of digital dollar devaluation. If someone knows how to do this… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1636797265317867520 https://t.co/6Aav9KeJpe
